definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: stoop, bend, incline (Ar. s.aga0 (w, y) incline, lean, cf. also s.agiya);—

[[חׂעֶה]] Is 51:14 one stooping (under a burden), Is 63:1 bending (forward or backward; fr. abundant strength), but read prob. [[חׂעֵד]] marching (Lo Gr Che Du Di-Kit al.); f. [[אַתְּ חׂעָה זּׁנׇה]] Je 2:20 (in sensu obscoeno).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: q.v.) pl. [[חׂעִים]] Je 48:12 men inclining, tipping a vessel, to empty it.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. sf. [[וְחֵעֻהוּ]] Je 48:12 I will send tippers and they shall tip him over (Moab, under fig. of vessel).
